/oic/sec/doxm.title: Device OTMs
/oic/sec/doxm.description: Resource for supporting Device owner transfer

/oic/sec/cred.title: Credentials
/oic/sec/cred.description: Resource containing credentials for Device authentication, verification and data protection

/oic/sec/crl.title: CRLs
/oic/sec/crl.description: Resource containing CRLs for Device certificate revocation

/oic/sec/pstat.title: Provisioning Status
/oic/sec/pstat.description: Resource for managing Device provisioning status

/oic/sec/csr.title: Certificate Signing Request
/oic/sec/csr.description: The CSR resource contains a Certificate Signing Request for the Device’s public key

/oic/sec/acl2.title: Access Control List
/oic/sec/acl2.description:
This Resource specifies the local access control list.
When used without query parameters, all the ACE entries are returned.
When used with a query parameter, only the ACEs matching the specified
parameter are returned.

/oic/sec/sdi.title: Security Domain Information
/oic/sec/sdi.description: This Resource contains the information that identifies the OCF Security Domain to which the device belongs.\n
